page.title: 14Halfway children at play
page.content: {WHERE & WHAT WE PLAY: Rural terrain:} Eckington Woods: tree climbing, wading Fields: conkers, hide & seek. Brow Farm: scrumping, avoiding farmer. Little field: fighting, racing {: Urban terrain:} Playgrounds: swings, slides, climbing. School yard: local games Halfway Centre: army, bikes, skates. Streets: local games, bikes, skates. All-weather pitch: bikes, sports { :Unauthorised areas: Westfield Lower School: climbing on roof, tree climbing, roller skating, playing in long- and high-jump pits Quarry: adventure games, climbing on piles of sand and salt, rock climbing Building site: playing on plant, making a mess, vandalising windows etc Cemetery: hide and seek.
